title: Wes Cravetrends' New Zeitmare 3/17: DDT, St. Patrick's Day, NBA, Billie Eilish, The Onion, Rudy Giuliani
itunes:title: Wes Cravetrends' New Zeitmare 3/17: DDT, St. Patrick's Day, NBA, Billie Eilish, The Onion, Rudy Giuliani
description:
On this edition of Wes Cravetrends' New Zeitmare Jack and Miles discuss the waters off California being a dumping ground for DDT, today is St. Patrick's Day, NBA news: Shawn Bradley paralyzed after cycling accident; Damien Lillard for MPV?; Why it’s so hard to respect the Utah Jazz; LeBron becomes part owner of Boston Red Sox, Billie Eilish goes blonde, the Onion's scathing headlines regarding latest mass shooting, and Rudy Giuliani was an "unwitting" participant in Russian propaganda.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
